title: Eagles-Giants MNF Recap, Spygate 2.0 for Patriots? (Football 12/10)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to recap the Eagles 23-17 OT victory over the Giants on Monday Night Football (:15). The guys discuss Eli Manning's up and then down performance, coaching blunders from Pat Shurmur, how Philadelphia emerged with the win and the likelihood of them making the playoffs and also winning a postseason game. The Pick Six Superfriends also analyze the Patriots illegally filming the Bengals (26:15), breaking down what it means and potential punishment. Next, CBS Sports Senior NFL Reporter Jonathan Jones explains why the Patriots shouldn't be considered dead yet after their loss to the Chiefs (48:15), while also exploring officiating fixes, Patrick Mahomes' health and more on the second coming of Spygate.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
